backend.redis_client module

async backend.redis_client.add_key_value_redis(key, value, expire=None)[source]

Adds a key-value pair to Redis, with an optional expiration time.

Parameters:

  • key (str) – The key to store.

  • value (str or bytes) – The value to store.

  • expire (Optional[int]) – Expiration time in seconds, defaults to None (no expiration).

async backend.redis_client.get_value_redis(key)[source]

Retrieves a value from Redis given a key.

Parameters:

key (str) – The key to retrieve.

Returns:

The value associated with the key, or None if not found or an error occurs.

Return type:

Optional[bytes]

async backend.redis_client.delete_key_redis(key)[source]

Deletes a key from Redis.

Parameters:

key (str) – The key to delete.
